title: The Venus Project by Jacque Fresco Â· NOIR Films

json.text: I've been busy all my life  working on solutions to problems.
I'm social engineer and I try to improve  the world I live in.
Social engineer is one who concern themselves with  social phenomenon,
what makes the people the way they are.
All of the conditions responsible  for human behavior.
And how can society be rearrange
to function with minimum pain  and war, poverty, hunger, unemployment.
How we eliminate that.
This is what social engineer tries to minimize.
THE VENUS PROJECT
I did a lot of the groundwork
to try to find out  what it is that shapes the human behavior.
I call to remove the conditions that produces  serial killers, gangsters, thieves, murderers,
I try to remove the conditions responsible for human an aberrant behavior.
My partner is Roxanne Meadows.  She works with me
and this is all we set up to build  a Research Center here
to try to arrive at the best ways  for changing society in the shortest time possible.
We can build models of the cities system,
try to modify, bring it down and simplify  so that can be build all over the world.
And we try to work out systems in communication  for changing people in the shortest possible time.
Changing a middle set in their values.
The Venus Project is a method
of attaining sustainability for all people  by giving them point such as
We must declare Earth as common heritage  of all the world's people.
We must remove all the artificial boundaries  that separate people.
- Are you ... freedom blacks.
We must make things available people  without money.
We must eliminate social elitism,  technical or otherwise.
So I said let's take care of everybody,  inventors, designers, engineers,  and the people on themselves.
Make things available to them,  and that will change the behavior.
We are walking in the wrong direction
and all over the world society is a collapsing,  going bankrupt.
No way will the work things out  just I use political methods.
Which was good I said a 100 years ago  but do they not work today.
So they're failing all over the world.
People have to lose their homes, their jobs.
They have to lose confidence  in the people they elected.
Once that happens they're open to new ideas.
"Oh, You never see that in a thousand years"
You are a dreamer, you are an Utopian,  a Goddamn communist, or you this or that.
And all things changes.
An utopia is an impossible concept,
it assume that you gotta the design of a city  that is good for all time.
You can't do that, everything changes.
That's the only constant in nature,  and that's change.
I don't believe that the cities  of the future will be fix.
There are radical changes continuously.
I do not believe in any final frontiers,
I believe in men and women  will continue to invent newer and better systems
and there's no limit  to what humans can do.
The pain of watching  the way the world is moving
on the directions of war, and human suffering,  and the lose of lives, and the destroy of cities.
All of that motivates me  to try to do a better job
than what politicians are trying  to accomplish without knowledge.
If enough people work at what I talked about  I believe in change the world.
If I do nothing, nothing will happens.
I can't accept a world as it's today.
So I do everything I can  to build a world sustainable,
for all people, not any single nation.
I don't hope to gain anything.
I just hope to do the best I can  and whatever that happens change.
Join The Venus Project movement.
www.thevenusproject.com
An HispaMat method transcription, by ioloo
NOIR Fims
